A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great addition to the series. I think the reasons people give it bad reviews is because their fan theories did not come true\, and/or all the hero’s from the episodes 4\, 5 and 6 have been killed. However I question why Snoke would be portrayed as a big bad guy with a huge role just to get killed off. I also question why Rey’s parents had such importance for them to just be drunks from Jakku. I really hope that these problems in the movie will be resolved in episode 9. Which I think they will. Overall a great movie.
